column1: MEAS mostly balances the game by adding hazards against the ''minion'' player and some support resources for the hero. Notable are the hazard creature versions of the five wizards.
MEAS was sold in booster packs of 12 cards (36 boosters per display)
column3: 4 uncommons and 6 commons per booster pack.
